General.Name: Fancamp Exploration Ltd
General.Description: Fancamp Exploration Ltd., a mineral exploration company, explores for mineral properties. The company explores for gold; strategic rare earth and base metals; and chromium, zinc, titanium, and iron ore deposits. It owns various mineral resource properties in Quebec, Ontario, and New Brunswick, Canada. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Burnaby, Canada.
General.Address: 7290 Gray Avenue, Burnaby, BC, Canada, V5J 3Z2

2.Name: Mr. Francois  Auclair F.G.A.C., geologist, M.Sc., P.Geo., PGeo
